alert.note: Alert for Southeast Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 1:41PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Norfolk, northwestern Bristol and eastern Providence Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 140 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Smithfield, or over Johnston, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Providence, Cranston, Pawtucket, Taunton, East Providence, Woonsocket, Cumberland, North Providence, Franklin, Johnston, North Attleborough, Attleboro, Walpole, Mansfield, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls, Norton, Foxborough and Bellingham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
